txt.en: 'South-east of the city of Dol Amroth are the ruins of Ost Amondal. With the war being over, merchants have begun to travel freely along the road that passes by them once more. However, it seems that the quieter days have led to a clutch of worms moving into the ruins.\n\n'If you are heading that way, take care. If you are inclined to lessen their numbers, even better!'
Abart창rik has asked you to lessen the worm population in Ost Amondal.\n\nOst Amondal is in southern Belfalas.
You should let Abart창rik know that you defeated many worms at Ost Amondal.\n\nAbart창rik is in Dol Amroth.
The ruins of Ost Amondal are home to fierce and dangerous creatures which threaten travel on the nearby roads.
'You've done Dol Amroth a great service this day. Thank you for doing what you could to help make the roads to Dol Amroth safer.'
